Title: Fantomas
Writer: Pierre Souvestre (novels), Marcel Allain (novels), Jean Halain (screenplay), Pierre Foucaud (screenplay), Jean Halain (dialogue)
Actors: Jean Marais, Louis de Funès, Mylène Demongeot, Jacques Dynam
Plot: The best men of France - a brave journalist and an extremely energetic commissioner - attack the trail of a mysterious criminal mastermind.
